name: Please Don't Fall
description:
Enter Fullscreen for better experience!! My first Unity game, my second game ever.

I made this game in ~48 hours for Winter Jam 2023 by Solodevelopment, everything is made by me  except the background music. Every other sound, lights, particles and so on are mine.

How to play:
1) WASD to move
2) LEFT MOUSE to shoot
3) SPACE to use blast when it is charged
4) Shoot red cubes and don't let them touch you
5) Don't shoot green cubes and let them touch you
6) Don't fall off the platform
7) Don't drop your health to zero

You are a lonely triange in the world of cubes...

Hope you enjoy my game!
